data.title: 1) The ghost question!
data.meta_description: Pick one film. What is the movie's interpretation of the ghost? Who or what is he? What is his relationship with Hamlet like? Does he wish Hamlet well or ill?
data.text:
Pick one film. What is the movie's interpretation of the ghost? Who or what is he? What is his relationship with Hamlet like? Does he wish Hamlet well or ill?

Author

Christina Swan teaches AP English IV to seniors at the Liberal Arts and Science Academy, in Austin, Texas. In her free time, she likes to watch sci fi shows on netflix. Over the summer she wrote some articles and gave some presentations in a desperate attempt to get media badges to some science fiction conventions. She also taught herself how to sew pants and build bookcases.
